reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the collection of Personal Information and Health Information from various sources and channels.
reply.reference: Otsuka collects Personal Information regarding its customers, visitors, and guests, including website visitors, patients or clinical trial subjects, healthcare providers, employees, workers or job applicants (collectively 'Individuals'). The data we collect from or about Individuals include information that may be deemed Personal Information (alone or in combination with other Information), such as name, address, age, birth date, phone number, email address, user name, government identification, and payment information. In addition, if you participate in certain programs or services, we may collect information regarding your medications, medical history, and other healthcare-related information, including Protected Health Information. URL: https://www.otsuka-us.com/oapi-and-opdc-privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Personal Information such as name, address, age, birth date, phone number, email address, user name, government identification, payment information, medications, medical history, healthcare-related information, health conditions, diagnosis, and treatment.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the collection of various types of Personal Information including health-related data and Protected Health Information.
reply.reference: The data we collect from or about Individuals include information that may be deemed Personal Information (alone or in combination with other Information), such as name, address, age, birth date, phone number, email address, user name, government identification, and payment information. In addition, if you participate in certain programs or services, we may collect information regarding your medications, medical history and other healthcare-related information, including, without limitation, Protected Health Information. URL: https://www.otsuka-us.com/oapi-and-opdc-privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The app's privacy policy clearly states that they disclose the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: The app may, however, disclose that information to its corporate affiliates, subsidiaries, vendors, and service providers to provide you with the SMS/text messaging service, to process and respond to your inquiries or requests, to comply with our legal obligations under applicable law, and for any other purpose to which you have consented to. URL: https://www.otsuka-us.com/oapi-and-opdc-privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by withdrawing consent at any time and by following the provided opt-out instructions.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the right to opt out of certain uses and disclosures of their Personal Information and can withdraw their consent at any time.
reply.reference: Where you have consented to Otsuka's processing of your Personal Information you may withdraw that consent at any time and opt out by following the included opt out instructions. URL: https://www.otsuka-us.com/oapi-and-opdc-privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app may share information related to online browsing activities for interest-based advertising purposes with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app may share information for interest-based advertising purposes.
reply.reference: Otsuka may use information related to your online browsing activities for interest-based advertising purposes. URL: https://www.otsuka-us.com/oapi-and-opdc-privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with business partners and affiliates, as well as non-affiliated parties for legal protection and compliance purposes.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing user data with business partners, affiliates, and non-affiliated parties for legal protection purposes.
reply.reference: Business Partners, Affiliates, Non-affiliated Parties for Legal Protection. URL: https://www.otsuka-us.com/oapi-and-opdc-privacy-policy

2.4 Information from External Sources
Otsuka may collect information about you from external sources to supplement information provided by you. This supplemental information allows us to verify information that you have provided to Otsuka and to enhance our ability to provide you with information about our business, products, services, and educational information. Otsuka's agreements with these external sources typically limit how the Company may use this supplemental information.
